Name: Blob From Space
About the game: Blob From Space is a 2d sidescroller game with an interactive story. In the story mode we learn the origin of Blob joining the Defenders of the multiverse. The game comes with challenging levels, but easy to learn. Blob From Space powers: Change into enemies. Walljump like you have never experienced before! Mini games of the game will come in the future. All mini games will come with new achievements!
